kpi.name: M5000C177

kpi_info.title: HS-DSCH CREDIT REDUCTIONS DUE TO SEVERE IUB DELAY
kpi_info.use: Number of HS-DSCH credit reductions due to severe Iub delay build-up. UPDATED: This counter increases when HSDPA congestion control applies rate control when the average delay is above the configured middle delay threshold.

kpi.kpi_alias: HS-DSCH CREDIT REDUCTIONS DUE TO SEVERE IUB DELAY
